attributes.action: Charge Scottish Taxpayers for the Bailout of Royal Bank of Scotland, in a similar way he wants to charge Icelandic Taxpayers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Royal Bank of Scotland was bailed out using £20billion of UK taxpayers money.  Icelandic Taxpayers are to be charged for the collapse of Icesave.  In a similar way the debts of a Scottish bank should be entirely funded by Scottish taxpayers.
